Class CurvedUIBase

Generate a curved plane that works as a base for curved UI elements.

Inheritance
System.Object
UnityEngine.Object
UnityEngine.Component
UnityEngine.Behaviour
UnityEngine.MonoBehaviour

Namespace: DUKE.UI

Syntax

public class CurvedUIBase : MonoBehaviour

GetAnglesOfFlatPoint(Vector3, Vector3)

Calculate the angles of a position.

Declaration
public Vector2 GetAnglesOfFlatPoint(Vector3 _flatWorldPos, Vector3 _wCenterPos)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _flatWorldPos

World coordinate position of a point.
UnityEngine.Vector3 _wCenterPos

World coordinate position of the centerpoint of the curve (UI center position, NOT the middle of the ring).
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector2

Angles (X,Y) of a position in relation to the center position of the curve.

GetAnglesOfWorldPoint(Vector3, Boolean)

Calculate the angles of a point in world coordinates. This method can be used to get accurate coordinates of a point on the curve.

Declaration
public Vector2 GetAnglesOfWorldPoint(Vector3 _worldPos, bool _shiftOutOfNegativeRange = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _worldPos

World coordinate position.
System.Boolean _shiftOutOfNegativeRange

Add 360 degrees to an angle if it is below 0.
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector2

Angles (X,Y) of a position in relation to the center position of the curve.

GetNormalOnCurvedPlane(Vector3)

Calculate the normal direction on the curve. Default direction is from the plane towards center, ignoring Y. The position provided as parameter does not have to be constrained on the curve in order to return the normal direction.

Declaration
public Vector3 GetNormalOnCurvedPlane(Vector3 _worldPosition)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _worldPosition
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3

GetPositionOnCurvedPlaneFromCoordinates(Vector2, Single, Boolean)

Find the coordinates of the provided percentage values within the grid. (0,0) is the left bottom corner and (1,1) is the right top corner.

Declaration
public Vector3 GetPositionOnCurvedPlaneFromCoordinates(Vector2 _coordinates01, float _radius, bool _worldCoordinates = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector2 _coordinates01
System.Single _radius
System.Boolean _worldCoordinates
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3

ProjectPointToCurvedPlane(Vector3, Vector3)

Project a world position to curve. Position is used as relative to this object's transform, which means that positional Z is used to modify the radius of the calculation while X and Y control the position on the curved plane. This method is used by CurvedUIElements to calculate their shape.

Declaration
public Vector3 ProjectPointToCurvedPlane(Vector3 _flatWorldPos, Vector3 _wCenterPos)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _flatWorldPos
UnityEngine.Vector3 _wCenterPos

Center position of the source CurvedUIElement. Source is the topmost CurvedUIElement of the hierarchy.
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3

World position of the vertex projected to the curve.

ProjectPointToCurvedPlane(Vector3, Vector3, Vector3, Boolean)

Project a world position to curve. Position is used as relative to this object's transform, which means that positional Z is used to modify the radius of the calculation while X and Y control the position on the curved plane. This method is used by CurvedUIElements to calculate their shape.

Declaration
public Vector3 ProjectPointToCurvedPlane(Vector3 _flatWorldPos, Vector3 _wObjCenterPos, Vector3 _wCenterPos, bool _logInfo = false)
Parameters
Type Name Description
UnityEngine.Vector3 _flatWorldPos

World position of the vertex (usually mesh.vertices[x]).
UnityEngine.Vector3 _wObjCenterPos
UnityEngine.Vector3 _wCenterPos

Center position of the source CurvedUIElement. Source is the topmost CurvedUIElement of the hierarchy.
System.Boolean _logInfo
Returns
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector3

World position of the vertex projected to the curve.
